text:
Parity Computing, Inc. | Senior Data Scientist | San Diego, CA | Onsite | https://www.paritycomputing.com/careers/

Parity Computing has been providing intelligent automation systems to science, technology and medicine (STM) publishers, academic/industry researchers, and healthcare organizations for almost 20 years. Parity achieves industry leading accuracy for applications in large-scale entity disambiguation and profiling, real-time clinical decision support, and predictive modeling for precision medicine.

We are looking for a Data Scientist with 6-14 years of experience, especially in NLP and Text Analytics, to be part of a small team that identifies, develops and maintains models for applications in science, technology, and medicine.

Send resumes to jobs@paritycomputing.com
